channel.title: Need help with a Major Null Problem
channel.description: I am making a client, I made it - Now I just have to add stuff to the server. But there's one big problem!! Every single item after 9999 turns into a null!! The items that are in class8.java do not do this but do when I interact with it. Anything before 9999 is fine - Why is this?

item.title: Need help with a Major Null Problem
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

lol… dont worry it shouldnt take to long

item.title: Need help with a Major Null Problem
item.dc:creator: @Husk Husk
item.description:
@Husk wrote:

:eek:

THAT’S ALOT OF ITEMS!!!

I pinpointed it to be 07955 as the last non null - All others are null unless listed

So I have to do

if(i == 15072){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[4];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[4];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 61;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 38676;
class8.anInt174 = 5037;
class8.anInt181 = 770;
class8.anInt190 = 164;
class8.anInt198 = 156;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 3;
class8.anInt194 = -3;
class8.anInt165 = 4954;
class8.anInt200 = 5031;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Admin Boots”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “Admin boots”.getBytes();
}

And change it for every item…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2008, 04:22:40 AM[/size][hr]And on top of that, I need to change all the stats, and I need to put them in the right slot…

Years… I’ll do 100 each day…

Read full topic
